channel.title: Graham Krizek on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Graham Krizek on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: SLP324 Scaling Bitcoin off-chain with Matt Corallo, Alex Bosworth, Lisa Neigut, and Graham Krizek
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/324/ Stephan Livera: So guys, thanks for joining us. We’re talking about off-chain scaling. And so obviously Lightning is the first thing that comes to our mind, but maybe we could start with this idea of What is off-chain scaling? I think Lisa, you had something to add on this, didn’t you? Matt Corallo: We had a meeting in the back and we decided we were moving Lightning to TRON.
